about_the_game:
Blurred Reality is a first-person horror game where a seemingly simple computer game drags you into a nightmarish experience.

How dangerous can clicking on a link be? A message from your friend, a mysterious game link, and a decision that changes everything. As you download and start playing the game, strange events begin to unfold around you, and the line between reality and the digital world starts to blur.

When you lose contact with your friend, you decide to check on their apartment in the same building. But what you’ll find there will never let you rest. Inside their dark, abandoned room, you discover an unfinished message on their computer screen. But before they could send this warning, something took them. Now, it’s your turn.

Rushing back to your apartment, the elevator suddenly plunges to the basement. At that moment, you realize the truth: the game you were playing wasn’t just a game—it was reality itself.

Blurred Reality takes you on a journey of suspense, mystery, and spine-chilling terror. Distant footsteps echoing, flickering lights, and unsettling thunderclaps are just the beginning. The real danger is much closer.

Features:

  • Developed by a solo developer.

  • Visually and aurally rich experience.

  • Immersive, fear-filled gameplay.

  • Approximately 1 hour of playtime.

Are you ready to uncover the truth behind the link?
